portfolio.title: NBA Data Analytics
portfolio.description: I am currently working on this project that uses Machine Learning that will predict the next NBA MVP. I will be web scraping to gather players' statistics and load it into pandas for analysis. The goal is to identify trends and patterns in historical MVP data and use this information to employ machine learning algorithms to build predictive models.
portfolio.skills: Skills Utilizing: Python | Web Scraping | BeautifulSoup | Selenium | Pandas

portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.description: The website you are currently browsing! I developed and deployed a dynamic website portfolio using React, HTML, and CSS. This portfolio showcases my projects, skills, and personal details. I implemented a responsive web design approach to ensure optimal user experiences across various devices, including desktops, laptops, tablets, and smartphones. Utilizing CSS, I created an aesthetically pleasing and user-friendly interface to enhance the overall look and feel of the website.
portfolio.skills: Skills Utilized: React.JS | HTML | CSS | Email JS API

portfolio.title: VR Golf Frenzy
portfolio.description: Collaborated with a co-developer in Unity to create a Virtual Reality Mini-Golf game, overseeing project management through Jira for efficient task tracking and issue resolution. Utilized Unity and C-Sharp programming to implement interactive gameplay and VR mechanics, while also designing user-friendly UI elements. Adhered to Scrum principles, engaging in daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives to ensure a streamlined development process.
portfolio.skills: Skills Utilized: Unity Engine | C# | Scrum Methodologies | Jira Software
